desc: Snuggables offers microwavable heat therapy products & natural sleep aids including stuffed animals w/inner heat packs & hot/cold pack heating pads in various sizes infused w/aromatherapy.  Warm Buddy makes all our quality products that help kids & adults sleep, calm the autistic & those w/sensory processing disorders.

layout.text: All Natural Relief from Aches, Pains & Stress, Pure Aromatherapy & Natural Sleep Aids for Kids & Adults made by Warm Buddy
